content: to 3 sts before end of sole needle k2tog k1 knit instep sts in established pattern using the leg chart on sole needle - k1 ssk k to marker round 2 straight round k to end of sole stitches knit instep sts in established pattern k to end of round repeat rounds 1 & 2 above until there are 33 39 sts remaining on sole needle instep needle has maintained 33 39 sts so you are back to your beginning stitch count foot continue to knit sole stitches in stockinette and instep stitches in pattern until sock is 2 shorter than your final length make sure to try it on before starting the toe toe set up remove marker knit to end of sole stitches this is your new beginning of round round 1 k all stitches round 2 k1 ssk k until 3 sts are left on instep needle k2tog k1 repeat on sole needle repeat rounds 1 & 2 for the toe until you have 22 stitches left - 11 on each needle - or until desired final length is achieved ending with a decrease round kitchener/graft the remaining stitches together weave in ends and wear ©knittymelissa melissa beyer 2014 3 do not copy sell or distribute without permission ©knittymelissa melissa beyer 2014 4 do not copy sell or distribute without permission
